intro: Engineering is one of the most popular courses among students pursuing higher education in the science field. A bachelor's degree in engineering can lead to a variety of job opportunities. Students can pick from a variety of engineering fields to see which ones interest them. SUB-DISCIPLINES  Electronics Engineering Civil Engineering Chemical Engineering Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering Geomatics Engineering Mechanical Engineering Architecture Engineering is the application of scientific concepts to the design and construction of machines, structures, and other objects such as bridges, tunnels, roads, vehicles, and structures, such as bridges, tunnels, roads, cars, and buildings. The discipline encompasses a wide range of subfields including Civil Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Bioengineering, Spatial Engineering, Computer Engineering, and so on.
